title: Small Box, Big Watts: EcoFlow DELTA Max Offers Portable Power With Fast Charge Times
content:
The EcoFlow DELTA Max is a portable power station that can travel with you to the campsite, cabin, or weekend-long bike race for a reliable source of energy. Aside from an adventure companion, the EcoFlow DELTA Max is an option for backup power at home. It holds its charge for months and can use the
